div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 666 Tiranë, 1964 Burial: c. 48 B.C. Contents: 119 AR. Pot hoard Apollonia: 31 dr. Imit. Apollonia: 1 dr. Dyrrhachium: 39 dr. Imit.Dyrrhachium: 2 dr. Roman Rep.: 46 den. (to 49 B.C.) Disposition: Tiranë † Ceka, Studime Historike 1 (1966), pp. 11-5, 24-36, illus. (in Albanian; French summary); Studia Albanica 1 (1966), pp. 217-23
